explains: v. （为某种用途、目的而）指定，预定，选定；区分；意欲；筹划

sentences.en: Some things destine that it is not yours.
sentences.cn: 有些东西注定不是你的。

sentences.en: Some people destine to wait for other people.
sentences.cn: 有些人是注定等待别人的。

sentences.en: Life for meeting which persons destine and walk which road, choose which road also destine and meet which persons.
sentences.cn: 人生为了遇见哪些人注定要走哪条路，选择了哪条路也就注定要遇见哪些人。
